query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative approach to music videos and performance art redefine the entertainment industry and influence future generations of artists?

query_2.text: How did Whitney Houston's unique vocal style and emotional delivery influence the evolution of pop and R&B music in the 1980s and 1990s?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to constantly reinvent his musical style and persona influence the evolution of pop culture and the acceptance of gender fluidity in the music industry?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's unique blend of theatricality and musical innovation influence the evolution of rock music and performance art in the decades following his career?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's evolution as an artist and public figure influenced the way her music addresses themes of mental health and personal empowerment?

query_6.text: How did Bob Marley's music reflect the social and political struggles of his time, and what lasting impact did it have on the global perception of reggae as a genre?
